entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bas-Caraquet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bas Caraquet 04:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: SSW 11 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. High minus 17.
